statements.select: select tb_gxcccp_ID, tb_gxcccp_gxbs, tb_gxcccp_wpbs, tb_gxcccp_isdp, tb_gxcccp_ccps from tb_gxcccp where tb_gxcccp_ID = $value$

select tb_gxcccp_ID, tb_gxcccp_gxbs, tb_gxcccp_wpbs, tb_gxcccp_isdp, tb_gxcccp_ccps from tb_gxcccp
(tb_gxcccp_ID != #tb_gxcccp_ID# and tb_gxcccp_gxbs = #tb_gxcccp_gxbs# and tb_gxcccp_wpbs = #tb_gxcccp_wpbs#)

select cast(newid() as varchar(50)) as rowBs, tb_gxcccp_ID, tb_gxcccp_gxbs, tb_gxcccp_wpbs, tb_gxcccp_isdp, tb_gxcccp_ccps, b.tb_wp_pm, b.tb_wp_dm, b.tb_wp_ID from tb_gxcccp a left join tb_wp b on a.tb_gxcccp_wpbs=b.tb_wp_ID
a.tb_gxcccp_gxbs = #tb_gxcccp_gxbs#
statements.insert:
insert into tb_gxcccp ( tb_gxcccp_gxbs, tb_gxcccp_wpbs, tb_gxcccp_isdp, tb_gxcccp_ccps ) values ( #tb_gxcccp_gxbs#, #tb_gxcccp_wpbs#, #tb_gxcccp_isdp#, #tb_gxcccp_ccps# )
select @@IDENTITY as value
statements.update:
update tb_gxcccp
tb_gxcccp_gxbs = #tb_gxcccp_gxbs#
tb_gxcccp_wpbs = #tb_gxcccp_wpbs#
tb_gxcccp_isdp = #tb_gxcccp_isdp#
tb_gxcccp_ccps = #tb_gxcccp_ccps#
where tb_gxcccp_ID = $tb_gxcccp_ID$
